titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1937 PORC'HER. Gob. 03-45 Madame Madame, 54 Avenue de la Republique. Hopital Ste Anne Ville (Seine) 1 rue Cabanis - 14e
1m. 1v. 15.00 ref. April 5 Deposit 30.00 March 1. Half a minutes silence. March. 16 16. renewed. April 5. 1940 Feb 14 With Malice Towards Some Feb 27. " 27 Far Away and Long Ago March 19 March 19. Of Human Bondage April 2 April 16 Weather in the Streets May 7 May 7 Rueful Mating (left) June 21 Bliss June March 7 1941 High Wind in Jamaica Mar 24 Mar 24 Diary of a provincial lady April 7 April 7 Come and get it April 25 April 25 Invitation to the Waltz May 5 May 5 Provincial Lady in America May 26 26 Brazilian adventure June 4 June 4 Lunatic at Large July 2 4 Lolly Willowes July 2 July 2 Breakfast in Bed July 15 15 My Antonia Sept 26 26 Sons & Lovers Oct 20 Oct 20 Portrait of the Artist as a Young dog Nov 22 give Mme Porcher shopping and 26 Three Englishmen returned
